amendment.description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 118-4 to add at the end of section 2(d) the definition to "significant impact" in Sec.2 (a). The term significant impact on inflation means an Executive order was estimated to increase or decrease Consumer Price Index inflation by at least 1% percentage point over the course of a year.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to add at the end of section 2(d) the definition to "significant impact" in Sec.2 (a). The term significant impact on inflation means an Executive order was estimated to increase or decrease Consumer Price Index inflation by at least 1% percentage point over the course of a year.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 232 (Roll no. 128).
